reviews.text:
If you go, you get the Buffalo Chicken Sandwich. It's the best for a reason!

BUT for this summer, as a special, make sure you order the Hoosier Daddy Pork...

Easton restaurant:  The Hostess with the attitude and missing waiter..
We were told a 20 minute wait, which was fine for a part of 5.  The restaurant had...
Ordered the 1/2 soup salad for dinner. Ordered the steak chili. I must say that it was not to my liking. To me Chili should be chili not what they served as...
